Text:
The truth is that it does no harm to any user on its own. Combine with alcohol you get real fucked up and are prone to danger. There is no burn out after years of use, one only has the symptoms of burnout while actually using the drug, ie you are only drunk when your drunk, stoned when you are stoned. There is nothing wrong with marijuana, it is illegal, but not immoral. 

So dont bogart that joint.
